thread.title: First Alert Forecast: Sunny, mild Saturday with a few showers early Sunday
thread.title_full: First Alert Forecast: Sunny, mild Saturday with a few showers early Sunday

author: Isaac Williams
title: First Alert Forecast: Sunny, mild Saturday with a few showers early Sunday
text:
First Alert Forecast: Sunny, mild Saturday with a few showers early Sunday
Christmas week is still looking quite warm with highs reaching the 70s.
Published: Dec. 20, 2025 at 7:22 AM EST|Updated: 33 minutes ago
ATLANTA, Ga. (Atlanta News First) — Beautiful weather is in store Saturday with warmer air moving in next week.
This morning is starting clear and chilly with temperatures in the 30s. We’ll see lots of sunshine through the day with highs reaching the 60s by afternoon.
Clouds will increase overnight ahead of a weak front Sunday morning. A few showers are possible during the morning hours, but rain amounts (if any) will be light. Sunshine should return in the afternoon.
Christmas week starts slightly cooler in the upper 50s Monday, but temperatures will quickly climb through the rest of the week. We’re expecting several days of 70+ degrees!
